segments.text: I'm going to the hospital to see Susan Green .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw her yesterday . She was a little better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Must I catch a number 7 bus to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you needn't . A number 13 bus will also take you to the hospital .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Number 13 buses run much more frequently , don't they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I caught a number 7 bus yesterday , and I had to wait for half an hour at the bus stop
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Henry . I'll get a number 13 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But number 13 buses leave from the centre of town . You'll have to walk two miles to catch one .
segments.speaker: S2
